verses.verse: Again, <S%H1732>David<s%> gathered <S%H622%H3254>together<s%> all the <S%H977>chosen<s%> men of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> with all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him from Baale of <S%H1184>Judah<s%>, to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> from thence the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> between the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>.

And they <S%H7392>set<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> upon a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5699>cart<s%>, and <S%H5375>brought<s%> it out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> that was in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>: and <S%H5798>Uzzah<s%> and <S%H283>Ahio<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, <S%H5090>drave<s%> the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5699>cart<s%>.

And they <S%H5375>brought<s%> it out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> which was at <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>, <S%H5973>accompanying<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and <S%H283>Ahio<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7832>played<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> on all manner of instruments made of <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, even on <S%H3658>harps<s%>, and on <S%H5035>psalteries<s%>, and on <S%H8596>timbrels<s%>, and on <S%H4517>cornets<s%>, and on <S%H6767>cymbals<s%>.

¶ And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5225>Nachon's<s%> <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%>, <S%H5798>Uzzah<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his hand to the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and took <S%H270>hold<s%> of it; for the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> <S%H8058>shook<s%> it.

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H5798>Uzzah<s%>; and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him there for his <S%H7944>error<s%>; and there he <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2734>displeased<s%>, because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6555>made<s%> a <S%H6556>breach<s%> upon <S%H5798>Uzzah<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the name of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6560>Perez-uzzah<s%> to this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, How shall the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to me?

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto him into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>: but <S%H1732>David<s%> carried it <S%H5186>aside<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%>.

And the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3427>continued<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%>, and all his <S%H1004>household<s%>.

¶ And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%>, and all that pertaineth unto him, because of the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>. So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> with <S%H8057>gladness<s%>.

And it was so, that when they that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6805>gone<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6806>paces<s%>, he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H7794>oxen<s%> and <S%H4806>fatlings<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3769>danced<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with all his <S%H5797>might<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2296>girded<s%> with a <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting<s%>, and with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>.

And as the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> through a <S%H2474>window<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6339>leaping<s%> and <S%H3769>dancing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and she <S%H959>despised<s%> him in her <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

¶ And they <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3322>set<s%> it in his <S%H4725>place<s%>, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for it: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And as soon as <S%H1732>David<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5927>offering<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

And he <S%H2505>dealt<s%> among all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, even among the whole <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as well to the <S%H802>women<s%> as <S%H376>men<s%>, to every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and a good <S%H829>piece<s%> of flesh, and a <S%H809>flagon<s%> of wine. So all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H1004>household<s%>. And <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, How <S%H3513>glorious<s%> was the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>, who <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> himself to <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H519>handmaids<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, as <S%H259>one<s%> of the vain <S%H7386>fellows<s%> <S%H1540>shamelessly<s%> <S%H1540>uncovereth<s%> himself!

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4324>Michal<s%>, It was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which <S%H977>chose<s%> me before thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and before all his <S%H1004>house<s%>, to <S%H6680>appoint<s%> me <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: therefore will I <S%H7832>play<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And I will yet be more <S%H7043>vile<s%> than <S%H2063>thus<s%>, and will be <S%H8217>base<s%> in mine own <S%H5869>sight<s%>: and of the <S%H519>maidservants<s%> which thou hast <S%H559>spoken<s%> of, of them shall I be had in <S%H3513>honour<s%>.
Therefore <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had no <S%H2056%H3206>child<s%> unto the <S%H3117>day<s%> of her <S%H4194>death<s%>.
